verses.verse: Righteous <S%H6662><s%> art thou, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, when I plead <S%H7378><s%> with thee: yet let me talk <S%H1696><s%> with thee of thy judgments <S%H4941><s%>: Wherefore doth the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%>? wherefore are all they happy <S%H7951><s%> that deal very <S%H899><s%> treacherously <S%H898><s%>? talk: or, reason the case with thee

Thou hast planted <S%H5193><s%> them, yea, they have taken root <S%H8327><s%>: they grow <S%H3212><s%>, yea, they bring forth <S%H6213><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>: thou art near <S%H7138><s%> in their mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and far from <S%H7350><s%> their reins <S%H3629><s%>. they grow: Heb. they go on

But thou, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, knowest <S%H3045><s%> me: thou hast seen <S%H7200><s%> me, and tried <S%H974><s%> mine heart <S%H3820><s%> toward thee: pull them out <S%H5423><s%> like sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2878><s%>, and prepare <S%H6942><s%> them for the day <S%H3117><s%> of slaughter <S%H2028><s%>. toward: Heb. with thee

How long shall the land <S%H776><s%> mourn <S%H56><s%>, and the herbs <S%H6212><s%> of every field <S%H7704><s%> wither <S%H3001><s%>, for the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein? the beasts <S%H929><s%> are consumed <S%H5595><s%>, and the birds <S%H5775><s%>; because they said <S%H559><s%>, He shall not see <S%H7200><s%> our last end <S%H319><s%>.

If thou hast run <S%H7323><s%> with the footmen <S%H7273><s%>, and they have wearied <S%H3811><s%> thee, then how canst thou contend <S%H8474><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%>? and if in the land <S%H776><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>, wherein thou trustedst <S%H982><s%>, they wearied thee, then how wilt thou do <S%H6213><s%> in the swelling <S%H1347><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>?

For even thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, even they have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> with thee; yea, they have called <S%H7121><s%> a multitude <S%H4392><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee: believe <S%H539><s%> them not, though they speak <S%H1696><s%> fair words <S%H2896><s%> unto thee. they have called: or, they cried after thee fully fair: Heb. good things

I have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> mine house <S%H1004><s%>, I have left <S%H5203><s%> mine heritage <S%H5159><s%>; I have given <S%H5414><s%> the dearly beloved <S%H3033><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%> into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of her enemies <S%H341><s%>. the dearly: Heb. the love

Mine heritage <S%H5159><s%> is unto me as a lion <S%H738><s%> in the forest <S%H3293><s%>; it crieth out <S%H5414><s%> <S%H6963><s%> against me: therefore have I hated <S%H8130><s%> it. crieth: or, yelleth: Heb. giveth out his voice

Mine heritage <S%H5159><s%> is unto me as a speckled <S%H6641><s%> bird <S%H5861><s%>, the birds <S%H5861><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> are against her; come <S%H3212><s%> ye, assemble <S%H622><s%> all the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, come <S%H857><s%> to devour <S%H402><s%>. speckled: or, taloned come to: or, cause them to come to

Many <S%H7227><s%> pastors <S%H7462><s%> have destroyed <S%H7843><s%> my vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, they have trodden <S%H947><s%> my portion <S%H2513><s%> under foot <S%H947><s%>, they have made <S%H5414><s%> my pleasant <S%H2532><s%> portion <S%H2513><s%> a desolate <S%H8077><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>. pleasant: Heb. portion of desire

They have made <S%H7760><s%> it desolate <S%H8076><s%>, and being desolate <S%H8077><s%> it mourneth <S%H56><s%> unto me; the whole land <S%H776><s%> is made desolate <S%H8074><s%>, because no man <S%H376><s%> layeth <S%H7760><s%> it to heart <S%H3820><s%>.

The spoilers <S%H7703><s%> are come <S%H935><s%> upon all high places <S%H8205><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: for the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> from the one end <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> even to the other end <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: no flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall have peace <S%H7965><s%>.

They have sown <S%H2232><s%> wheat <S%H2406><s%>, but shall reap <S%H7114><s%> thorns <S%H6975><s%>: they have put themselves to pain <S%H2470><s%>, but shall not profit <S%H3276><s%>: and they shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%> of your revenues <S%H8393><s%> because of the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>. they shall: or, ye shall

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> against all mine evil <S%H7451><s%> neighbours <S%H7934><s%>, that touch <S%H5060><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> which I have caused my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to inherit <S%H5157><s%>; Behold, I will pluck them out <S%H5428><s%> of their land <S%H127><s%>, and pluck out <S%H5428><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> them.

And it shall come to pass, after <S%H310><s%> that I have plucked them out <S%H5428><s%> I will return <S%H7725><s%>, and have compassion <S%H7355><s%> on them, and will bring them again <S%H7725><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> to his heritage <S%H5159><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> to his land <S%H776><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they will diligently <S%H3925><s%> learn <S%H3925><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, to swear <S%H7650><s%> by my name <S%H8034><s%>, The LORD <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>; as they taught <S%H3925><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> to swear <S%H7650><s%> by Baal <S%H1168><s%>; then shall they be built <S%H1129><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>.
But if they will not obey <S%H8085><s%>, I will utterly <S%H5428><s%> pluck up <S%H5428><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> that nation <S%H1471><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
